ENGLISH DESCRIPTION

LivePCUtilities is an interface to launch [Shell] multi usages.Cette interface want simplistic while wanting to please the insiders see some of the fans. 

Just as its name suggests, LivePCUtilities is a 100% Portable. No installation is necessary in order to make it work. The minimum configuration is Windows XP SP2. LPCU develops and is optimized for Windows Vista. 

The interface allows you to navigate between tabs as, cleaning, preservation, security, Engraving & encoding, Multimedia, other etc. .. It includes a portion User starting with an option that allows it to easily access the essential functions of his microphone, but also functions without having attended too many questions to ask. 

LPCU is a friendly application that uses the best capabilities of your operating system to facilitate certain tasks. 

This interface allows you to use freeware software but also shareware. You must have a license for each shareware! Another big thank you to staff, donors, who contribute every day to companies using the Internet ...
